drinks.name: Frozen Strawberry Key Lime Margaritas
drinks.ingredients: 1/3 cup key lime juice, 1/3 cup tequila, 3 tbsp strawberry simple syrup, 3 cups crushed ice sugar

drinks.name: Classic Margarita Recipe
drinks.ingredients: 2 ounces tequila, 1 ounce orange liqueur, 1 ounce lime juice, 1 lime for garnish

drinks.name: Margarita
drinks.ingredients: 2 ounces blanco tequila, 1/2 ounce orange liqueur, 1 ounce lime juice, freshly squeezed, 1/2 ounce agave syrup Garnish: lime wheel

drinks.name: Pink Vodka Lemonade Cocktail
drinks.ingredients: 2 cups ice, 180 ml vodka ((3/4 cup) ), 80 ml Lime juice ((1/3 cup) ), 80 ml Cranberry juice ((1/3 cup) ), 60 ml Malibu ((1/4 cup))

drinks.name: Pineapple Vodka Cocktail!
drinks.ingredients: 3 ounces (6 tablespoons) pineapple juice, 2 ounces (1/4 cup) vodka, 1/2 ounce (1 tablespoon) lime juice,  1 splash grenadine Ice

drinks.name: Vodka Cherry Limeade
drinks.ingredients: 0.5 cup (4 ounces) vodka, 2 cups lemon-lime soft drink, 0.25 cup maraschino cherry juice, 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice, 1 tablespoon simple syrup

drinks.name: Rosemary Gin Cocktail
drinks.ingredients: Ice, 2 ounces fresh orange juice, 2 ounces tonic water, 1 ounce London Dry gin, 1/2 ounce Rosemary Simple Syrup

drinks.name: Gin Gimlet
drinks.ingredients: 2 ounces (4 tablespoons) gin, 1/2 ounce (1 tablespoon) lime juice, 1/2 ounce ( 1 tablespoon) simple syrup or pure maple syrup, Splash of soda water (optional)

drinks.name: Raspberry Gin Cocktail
drinks.ingredients: 1 pint raspberries, 1 cup filtered water, 1/4 cup maple syrup, 1.5 ounces gin, 2 teaspoons fresh lemon juice
